sqlMap.select: SELECT IMAGE_SN, IMAGE_NM FROM TB_MAIN_IMAGE WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN BEGIN_DE AND END_DE ORDER BY SORT_ORDR

SELECT G.CART_SN, G.TOUR_DE, G.BEGIN_TIME, G.END_TIME, G.CHKIN_DE, G.CHCKT_DE, GOODS.GOODS_NM/*, N.NMPR_SN, N.SETUP_SE, N.NMPR_CO, GN.NMPR_CND*/ FROM TB_CART_GOODS G INNER JOIN TB_GOODS GOODS ON G.GOODS_CODE = GOODS.GOODS_CODE /*INNER JOIN TB_CART_NMPR N ON G.CART_SN = N.CART_SN INNER JOIN TB_GOODS_NMPR GN ON N.GOODS_CODE = GN.GOODS_CODE AND N.SETUP_SE = GN.SETUP_SE AND N.NMPR_SN = GN.NMPR_SN*/ WHERE G.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND G.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND GOODS.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND G.EXPRTN_AT = 'N' AND G.PURCHS_AT = 'N' AND GOODS.CL_SE <> 'S' ORDER BY G.TOUR_DE, G.BEGIN_TIME, G.CHKIN_DE
